title: Small-Group Education Based on Essential Neonatal Nursing Simulation (Large-Scale)

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical knowledge and understanding of neonatal physiology
context.additional_context: Enhancing practical skills for medical professionals through simulation-based training.

learning_goals: Learners can perform WHO-recommended essential neonatal nursing procedures with 90% accuracy.
Learners can apply neonatal emergency care protocols in simulation scenarios.
Learners achieve a score of 4 or higher on the high-risk delivery simulation evaluation rubric through team-based collaboration.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
